	"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PHYSICAL"

	"AbilityTextureName"			"bristleback_quill_spray"
	"precache"
	{
		"particle"				"particles/units/heroes/hero_bristleback/bristleback_quill_spray.vpcf"
		"particle"				"particles/units/heroes/hero_bristleback/bristleback_quill_spray_impact.vpcf"
		"particle"				"particles/units/heroes/hero_bristleback/bristleback_quill_spray_hit.vpcf"
	}
	"AbilityCastRange"				"850"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.0"
	"AbilityValues"
        {
            "radius" "850"
            "base_damage" "150.0"
            "stack_damage" "200.0"
            "stack_duration" "25"
        }
	"OnOwnerDied"
	{
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"Target"
			{
				"Center"		"CASTER"
				"Radius"		"%radius"
				"Teams"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
				"Types"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
			}
			"ModifierName"		"modifier_custom_quill_spray_stack"
		}
		"FireEffect"
		{
			"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_bristleback/bristleback_quill_spray.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"	"attach_hitloc"
			"EffectRadius"		"%radius"
			"Target"
			{
				"Center"		"CASTER"
				"Flags"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_DEAD"
			}
		}
		"FireSound"
		{
			"EffectName"		"Hero_Bristleback.QuillSpray.Cast"
			"Target"
			{
				"Center"		"CASTER"
				"Flags"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_DEAD"
			}
		}
		"FireSound"
		{
			"EffectName"		"Hero_Bristleback.QuillSpray.Target"
			"Target"
			{
				"Center"		"CASTER"
				"Radius"		"%radius"
				"Teams"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
				"Types"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
			}
		}
	}
	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_custom_quill_spray_debuff"
		{
			"IsDebuff"		"1"
			"TextureName"   "bristleback_quill_spray"
		}
		"modifier_custom_quill_spray_stack"
		{
			"IsHidden"		"1"
			"Attributes"	"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"
			"Duration"		"%stack_duration"
			"OnCreated"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"		"abilities/bosses/custom_quill_spray.lua"
					"Function"			"create_stack"
					"base_damage"		"%base_damage"
					"stack_damage"		"%stack_damage"
				}
				"FireEffect"
				{
					"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_bristleback/bristleback_quill_spray_impact.vpcf"
					"EffectAttachType"	"follow_hitloc"
					"Target"			"TARGET"
				}
				"AttachEffect"
				{
					"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_bristleback/bristleback_quill_spray_hit.vpcf"
					"EffectAttachType"	"follow_hitloc"
					"Target"			"TARGET"
					"ControlPointEntities"
					{
						"TARGET"		"attach_hitloc"
						"TARGET"		"attach_hitloc"
						"TARGET"		"attach_hitloc"
						"TARGET"		"attach_hitloc"
					}
				}
			}
			"OnDestroy"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"abilities/bosses/custom_quill_spray.lua"
					"Function"		"remove_stack"
				}
			}
		}
	}

"custom_spirits"
{

	"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"	
	"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"wisp_spirits"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0"
	"AbilityCooldown"				"0.0"
	"AbilityDuration"				"19.0"

	// Cost
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityManaCost"				"0"
	
	// Special
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"AbilityValues"
        {
            "creep_damage" "300"
            "hero_damage" "2500"
            "revolution_time" "2.5"
            "min_range" "1000"
            "max_range" "1000"
            "hero_hit_radius" "100"
            "explode_radius" "300"
            "hit_radius" "150"
            "default_radius" "150"
            "spirit_movement_rate" "250"
            "spirit_duration" "19.0"
            "num_spirits" "10"
            "spirit_summon_interval" "0.5"
            "spirit_turn_rate" "150"
            "vision_duration" "3.0"
            "think_interval" "0.03"
            "creep_damage_interval" "0.48"
        }
	
	// Data driven
	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	"precache"
	{
		"soundfile"					"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_wisp.vsndevts"
		"particle"					"particles/units/heroes/hero_wisp/wisp_guardian_.vpcf"
		"particle"					"particles/units/heroes/hero_wisp/wisp_guardian_explosion.vpcf"
		"particle"					"particles/units/heroes/hero_wisp/wisp_guardian_explosion_small.vpcf"
	}
	
	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"FireSound"
		{
			"EffectName"			"Hero_Wisp.Spirits.Cast"
			"Target"				"CASTER"
		}
		
		"RemoveModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"			"modifier_spirits_caster_datadriven"
			"Target"				"CASTER"
		}
		
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"			"modifier_spirits_caster_datadriven"
			"Target"				"CASTER"
		}
	}
	
	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_spirits_caster_datadriven"
		{
			"Duration"		"%spirit_duration"
		
			"OnCreated"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"		"abilities/bosses/custom_spirits.lua"
					"Function"			"CastSpirits"
					
					"default_radius"	"%default_radius"
					
					"empty1_ability"		"wisp_empty1_datadriven"
					"empty2_ability"		"wisp_empty2_datadriven"
					"spirits_in_ability"	"wisp_spirits_in_datadriven"
					"spirits_out_ability"	"wisp_spirits_out_datadriven"
				}
				
				"FireSound"
				{
					"EffectName"		"Hero_Wisp.Spirits.Loop"
					"Target"			"CASTER"
				}
			}
			
			"ThinkInterval"		"%think_interval"
			"OnIntervalThink"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"		"abilities/bosses/custom_spirits.lua"
					"Function"			"ThinkSpirits"
					
					"think_interval"			"%think_interval"
					
					"num_spirits"				"%num_spirits"
					"spirit_summon_interval"	"%spirit_summon_interval"
					"spirit_turn_rate"			"%spirit_turn_rate"
					
					"min_range"					"%min_range"
					"max_range"					"%max_range"
					"spirit_movement_rate"		"%spirit_movement_rate"
					
					"caster_modifier"			"modifier_spirits_caster_datadriven"
					
					"spirit_particle_name"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_wisp/wisp_guardian_.vpcf"
					"spirit_modifier"			"modifier_spirits_spirit_datadriven"
				}
			}
			
			"OnDestroy"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"		"abilities/bosses/custom_spirits.lua"
					"Function"			"EndSpirits"
					
					"spirit_modifier"	"modifier_spirits_spirit_datadriven"
					
					"empty1_ability"		"wisp_empty1_datadriven"
					"empty2_ability"		"wisp_empty2_datadriven"
					"spirits_in_ability"	"wisp_spirits_in_datadriven"
					"spirits_out_ability"	"wisp_spirits_out_datadriven"
				}
				
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"		"abilities/bosses/custom_spirits.lua"
					"Function"			"StopSound"
					"sound_name"		"Hero_Wisp.Spirits.Loop"
				}
			}
		}
		
		"modifier_spirits_spirit_datadriven"
		{
			"Aura"			"modifier_spirits_creep_damage_datadriven"
			"Aura_Radius"	"%hit_radius"
			"Aura_Teams"	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
			"Aura_Types"	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
			
			"OnCreated"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"		"abilities/bosses/custom_spirits.lua"
					"Function"			"OnCreatedSpirit"
					
					"additionalModifier"	"modifier_spirits_spirit_collision_with_hero_datadriven"
				}
			}
		
			"OnDestroy"
			{
				"RemoveModifier"
				{
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_spirits_spirit_collision_with_hero_datadriven"
					"Target"		"TARGET"
				}
			
				"FireEffect"
				{
					"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_wisp/wisp_guardian_explosion.vpcf"
					"EffectAttachType"	"attach_origin"
					"Target"			"TARGET"
				}
				
				"FireSound"
				{
					"EffectName"		"Hero_Wisp.Spirits.Destroy"
					"Target"			"TARGET"
				}
				
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"		"abilities/bosses/custom_spirits.lua"
					"Function"			"OnDestroySpirit"
					"Target"			"TARGET"

					"vision_duration"	"%vision_duration"
				}
				
				"Damage"
				{
					"Target"
					{
						"Center"  	"TARGET"
						"Radius" 	"%explode_radius"
						"Teams" 	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
						"Types" 	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
					}
					"Type"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"

				}
			}
			
			"States"
			{
				"MODIFIER_STATE_INVULNERABLE"			"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"

	"SpellDispellableType"			"SPELL_DISPELLABLE_NO"

	"AbilityCooldown"				"12"
	"AbilityManaCost"				"0"

			"ability_index"	"%ability_index"
		}
	}
}

"clinkz_custom_wind_walk"
{
	"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"clinkz_wind_walk"
	"HasScepterUpgrade"				"1"
	"AbilityCooldown"				"60.0 55.0 50.0 45.0"
	"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.0 0.0 0.0 0.0"
	"AbilityManaCost"				"75 75 75 75"

	"AbilityValues"
        {
            "duration" "20.0 25.0 30.0 35.0"
            "fade_time" "0.6 0.6 0.6 0.6"
            "move_speed_bonus_pct" "11 22 33 44"
        }
	"OnCreated"
	{
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"	"abilities/heroes/clinkz_custom_ward_buff.lua"
			"Function"		"LevelUpWardBuff"
		}
	}
	"precache"
	{
		"particle"  "particles/units/heroes/hero_clinkz/clinkz_windwalk.vpcf"
		"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_clinkz.vsndevts"
	}
	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"FireEffect"
		{
			"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_clinkz/clinkz_windwalk.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"	"attach_origin"
			"Target"			"CASTER"
		}
		"FireSound"
		{
			"Target"		"CASTER"
			"EffectName"	"Hero_Clinkz.WindWalk"
		}
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"Target"		"CASTER"
			"ModifierName"	"modifier_wind_walk_fade"
			"Duration"		"%fade_time"
		}
	}
	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_wind_walk_fade"
		{
			"IsHidden"			"1"
			"EffectName"		"particles/generic_hero_status/status_invisibility_start.vpcf"
			"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
			"OnDestroy"
			{
				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"Target"		"CASTER"
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_wind_walk"
					"Duration"		"%duration"
				}
				"ApplyModifier"
				{
					"Target"		"CASTER"
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_invisible"
					"Duration"		"%duration"
				}
			}
		}
		"modifier_wind_walk"
		{
			"OnAttackStart"
			{
				"RemoveModifier"
				{
					"Target"		"CASTER"
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_wind_walk"
				}
				"RemoveModifier"
				{
					"Target"		"CASTER"
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_invisible"
				}
			}
			"OnAbilityExecuted"
			{
				"RemoveModifier"
				{
					"Target"		"CASTER"
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_wind_walk"
				}
				"RemoveModifier"
				{
					"Target"		"CASTER"
					"ModifierName"	"modifier_invisible"
				}
			}
			"States"
			{
				"MODIFIER_STATE_INVISIBLE"	"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED" 
			}
			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%move_speed_bonus_pct" 
			}
			"OnDestroy"
			{
				"RemoveModifier"
				{
					"Target"
					{
						"Center"	"CASTER"
						"Flags"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_DEAD"
					}
				}
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"abilities/heroes/clinkz_custom_wind_walk.lua"
					"Function"		"scepter"
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

"axe_custom_last_cleave"
{
	"BaseClass"					"ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityBehavior"			"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
	"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
	"AbilityUnitTargetType"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
	"AbilityUnitDamageType"		"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"	
	"AbilityType"				"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
	"AbilityTextureName"		"axe_culling_blade"
	"HasScepterUpgrade"			"1"
	"MaxLevel"				  "5"
	"AbilityCastRange"			"500"
	"AbilityCastPoint"			"0.2"
	"AbilityCastAnimation"		"ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_4"
	"AbilityCooldown"			"50.0 45.0 40.0 35.0 30.0"
	"AbilityManaCost"			"50"
	"AbilityValues"
        {
            "base_damage" "250 450 1650 2500 6500"
            "str_multiply" "14 24 38 55 75"
        }
	"OnSpellStart"
	{
		"FireSound"
		{
			"EffectName"		"Hero_Axe.Culling_Blade_Success"
			"Target"			"CASTER"
		}
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile"		"abilities/heroes/axe_custom_last_cleave.lua"
			"Function"			"cast_last_cleave"
			"Target"			"TARGET"
		} 
	}
	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_culling_check_aura"
		{
			"Passive"				"1"
			"IsHidden"				"1"
			"Aura" 					"modifier_culling_check"
			"Aura_Radius" 			"99999"
			"Aura_Teams" 			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_FRIENDLY"
			"Aura_Types" 			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
			"Aura_ApplyToCaster" 	"0"
			"Aura_Flags" 			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NOT_ILLUSIONS"
		}
		"modifier_culling_check"
		{
			"IsHidden"  		"1"
			"OnDeath"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"		"abilities/heroes/axe_custom_last_cleave.lua"
					"Function"			"refresh_culling"
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

					"Target"		"CASTER"
					"EffectName"	"Hero_DragonKnight.BreathFire"
				}
				"LinearProjectile"
				{
					"Target"			"CASTER"
					"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_dragon_knight/dragon_knight_breathe_fire.vpcf"

					"EndRadius"		 "200"

					"TargetTeams"  		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
					"TargetTypes"   	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
					"TargetFlags"   	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NONE"
					"HasFrontalCone"	"1"
					"ProvidesVision" 	"1"
				}
			}
		}
	}
	"OnProjectileHitUnit"
	{
		"DeleteOnHit"			   "0"
		"FireSound"
		{

					"Target"
					{
						"Center"  	"TARGET"
						"Radius" 	"%radius"
						"Teams" 	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
						"Types" 	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
					}
				}
			}
			"OnDestroy"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"abilities/heroes/pugna_custom_nether_ward.lua"
					"Function"		"NetherWardEnd"
				}
			}
			"ThinkInterval"  "0.03"
			"OnIntervalThink"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"abilities/heroes/pugna_custom_nether_ward.lua"
					"Function"		"NetherWardMana"
					"Target"
					{
						"Center"  	"TARGET"
						"Radius" 	"%radius"
						"Teams" 	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
						"Types" 	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO"
					}
				}
			}
		}
		"modifier_nether_ward_debuff"
		{
			"IsDebuff"			"1"
			"OnAbilityExecuted"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"	"abilities/heroes/pugna_custom_nether_ward.lua"
					"Function"		"NetherWardZap"
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

        {
            "stat_loss" "-5"
            "duration" "40"
        }
	"Modifiers"
	{
		"modifier_slark_essence_shift_datadriven"  //This modifier is always on Slark and simply triggers a script when an autoattack lands on an enemy.
		{
			"Passive"   "1"
			"IsHidden"  "1"
			"OnAttackLanded"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"				"abilities/bosses/custom_life_rend.lua"
					"Function"		 			"modifier_slark_essence_shift_datadriven_on_attack_landed"
					"StatLoss"					"%stat_loss"
				}
			}
		}
		"modifier_slark_essence_shift_datadriven_debuff"
		{
			"Duration"				"%duration"
			"Passive"				"0"
			"IsHidden"  			"0"
			"IsPurgable"			"1"

			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_STRENGTH_BONUS"		"%stat_loss"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_AGILITY_BONUS"			"%stat_loss"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_INTELLECT_BONUS"		"%stat_loss"
			}
			"OnDestroy"  //Decrement the visible counter.
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile"				"abilities/bosses/custom_life_rend.lua"
					"Function"		 			"modifier_slark_essence_shift_datadriven_debuff_on_destroy"
				}
			}
		}
	}

		{
			"modifier_mjz_axe_counter_helix"
			{
				"Passive"			"1"
				"IsHidden"			"1"

				"OnAttackStart"		//当拥有modifier的单位开始攻击某个目标
				{
					"Random"
					{
						"Chance"			"%trigger_chance"
						"PseudoRandom" 		"DOTA_PSEUDO_RANDOM_JUGG_CRIT"
						"OnSuccess"
						{
							"RunScript"
							{
								"ScriptFile"		"abilities/hero_axe/mjz_axe_counter_helix.lua"
								"Function"			"OnAttackStart"
								"helix_modifier"	"modifier_mjz_axe_counter_helix_effect"
							}
						}
					}
				}

				"OnAttacked"		//当拥有modifier的单位被攻击时
				{
					"Random"
					{
						"Chance"			"%trigger_chance"
						"PseudoRandom" 		"DOTA_PSEUDO_RANDOM_JUGG_CRIT"
						"OnSuccess"
						{
							"RunScript"
							{
								"ScriptFile"		"abilities/hero_axe/mjz_axe_counter_helix.lua"
								"Function"			"OnAttacked"
								"helix_modifier"	"modifier_mjz_axe_counter_helix_effect"
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			"modifier_mjz_axe_counter_helix_effect"
			{
				"Duration"		"%cooldown"
				"IsHidden"		"1"

				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_axe/axe_attack_blur_counterhelix.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"			

				"OnCreated"
				{
					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"	"Hero_Axe.CounterHelix"
						"Target" 		"CASTER"
					}

					"ActOnTargets"
					{
						"Target"
						{
							"Center"  	"CASTER"
							"Radius" 	"%radius"
							"Teams" 	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
							"Types" 	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_MECHANICAL"
							"Flags"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
						}

						{
							// "Damage"
							// {

							}

	{

		"AOERadius"						"%radius"
		
		"AbilityCooldown"				"40.0"

		// "AbilityDamage"					"80 100 120 140"

		"AbilityManaCost"				"25"		

		"AbilityValues"
        {
            "blade_fury_damage_tick" "0.2"
            "radius" "550"
            "attack_tick" "0.6 0.5 0.4 0.2"
            "duration" "5.0"
        }

		"precache"
		{
			"particle"  "particles/units/heroes/hero_juggernaut/juggernaut_blade_fury.vpcf"
			"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_juggernaut.vsndevts"
		}

		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"  "modifier_mjz_juggernaut_blade_fury"
				"Target"		"CASTER"
				"Duration"	  "%duration"
			}   
		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_mjz_juggernaut_blade_fury"
			{   
				"OverrideAnimation"		 "ACT_DOTA_OVERRIDE_ABILITY_1"
				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_MAGIC_IMMUNE"	   "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_SILENCED"		   "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_DISABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_SOFT_DISARMED"	   "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_juggernaut/juggernaut_blade_fury.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
						"Target"			"CASTER"
						"ControlPoints"
						{
							"05"	"%radius 0 0"
						}				   
					}
					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"	"Hero_Juggernaut.BladeFuryStart"
						"Target"		"CASTER"
					}		   
				}
				
				"ThinkInterval"  "%attack_tick"		// "%blade_fury_damage_tick"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"ActOnTargets"
					{
						"Target"
						{
							"Center"	"CASTER"
							"Radius"	"%radius"
							"Teams"	 "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
							"Types"	 "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
							"Flags"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_FOW_VISIBLE | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NOT_ATTACK_IMMUNE | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_INVULNERABLE"
						}
					
						"Action"	
						{
							// "Damage"
							// {
							// 	"Target"		"TARGET"
							// 	"Type"		  "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
							// 	"Damage"		"%AbilityDamage * %blade_fury_damage_tick"
							// }
							"RunScript"
							{
								"ScriptFile"	"abilities/hero_juggernaut/mjz_juggernaut_blade_fury.lua"
								"Function"	  "AttackTarget"
							}
							
							"FireSound"
							{
								"EffectName"	"Hero_Juggernaut.BladeFury.Impact"
								"Target"		"TARGET"
							}
						}
					}	   
				}

				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"	"Hero_Juggernaut.BladeFuryStop"
						"Target"		"CASTER"
					}
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"abilities/hero_juggernaut/mjz_juggernaut_blade_fury.lua"

					}

					{
						"EffectName"	"Hero_Juggernaut.BladeFuryStop"

					}
				}

		}

"sniper_custom_rifle"
{
	"BaseClass"					 "ability_datadriven"
	"AbilityTextureName"			"sniper_assassinate"
	"AbilityBehavior"			   "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_TOGGLE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL"
	"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
	"AbilityCooldown"			   "0.0"
	"AbilityDamage"				 "0"
	"AbilityManaCost"			   "0"
	"AbilityValues"
        {
            "base_attack_time" "0.85 0.75 0.65"
            "damage" "-20 -25 -30"
            "rangered" "-250"
            "mana_regen_penalty" "-0.5"
        }
	"OnUpgrade"
	{
		"RunScript"
		{
			"ScriptFile" "abilities/other/toggle.lua"
			"Function"   "on_toggle_upgrade"
		}
	}
	"OnToggleOn"
	{
		"ApplyModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"	"sniper_custom_rifle_buff"
			"Target"		"CASTER"
		}
	}
	"OnToggleOff"
	{
		"RemoveModifier"
		{
			"ModifierName"	"sniper_custom_rifle_buff"
			"Target"		"CASTER"
		}
	}
	"Modifiers"
	{
		"sniper_custom_rifle_buff"
		{
			"IsBuff"		"1"
			"IsHidden"		"1"
			"Priority"		"MODIFIER_PRIORITY_ULTRA"
			"Attributes"	"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_IGNORE_INVULNERABLE"
			"Properties"
			{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASE_ATTACK_TIME_CONSTANT"	"%base_attack_time"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_DAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE"	"%damage"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACK_RANGE_BONUS"			"%rangered"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MANA_REGEN_TOTAL_PERCENTAGE"	"%mana_regen_penalty"
			}
			"OnAttack"
			{
				"RunScript"
				{
					"ScriptFile" "abilities/heroes/sniper_custom_rifle.lua"
					"Function"   "on_attack"
				}
			}
		}
	}

		}

        {
            "crit_damage" "2020 250 300 4220"
            "crit_chance"
            {
                "value" "2 2 2 5"

				{
					"RemoveModifier"
					{

					}
					"RemoveModifier"
					{

						"Target" 		"CASTER"
					}

					"RunScript"
					{

						"special_bonus"			"special_bonus_unique_mjz_chaos_strike"
					}

					// {

				"IsPurgable"	"0"

					"RemoveModifier"
